pma:database.name: colombomap
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `locations` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `lat` float(10,6) NOT NULL, `lng` float(10,6) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `location_status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `time` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `images` longblob NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=43 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
